mapper.insert: INSERT INTO booking (user_id, hotel_id, room_index, check_in_date, check_out_date, price, book_num) VALUES (#{userId},#{hotelId},#{roomIndex},#{checkInDate},#{checkOutDate},#{price},#{bookNum});
mapper.update:

mapper.select: SELECT book_id bookId, user_id userId, hotel_id hotelId, room_index roomIndex, check_in_date checkIndate, check_out_date checkOutDate, book_time bookTime, book_num bookNum, price FROM booking WHERE user_id=#{userId};
